text: Stausee Gibidum (Gibidum reservoir or "Stausee Gebidem") is a reservoir in the canton of Valais, Switzerland. Its surface area is 0.21 km², shared by the municipalities of Naters and Riederalp. The construction of Gebidem dam was started in 1964 and completed by 1967. The arch dam has an elevation of 122 m and a crest length of 327 m. ==See also== *List of mountain lakes of Switzerland ==External links== *Swiss Dams: Gebidem Category:Lakes of Valais Category:Reservoirs in Switzerland Gebidem
title: Stausee Gibidum
